text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمْ ۙ قَالُوٓا۟ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
translation.id.indonesian: Dan apabila dikatakan kepada mereka "Apakah yang telah diturunkan Tuhanmu?" Mereka menjawab: "Dongeng-dongengan orang-orang dahulu",
